name: Space Firehawk
overview: Developed by Karsten Senkel, you must battle waves of enemies and the more enemies you destroy the higher your score. Certain enemies give more points such as the emperor giving you 500 and the Torcher 750 points. The game features 12 different enemy types, asteroid fields, boss battles, power ups, ship and weapon upgrades, a balanced difficulty curve, and developed for PAL systems but will also run (a little faster) on NTSC. Sold as part of the BOBR games Space Collection.
